00106 class EGS_PHSP_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_PhspSource : public EGS_BaseSource {
00107 
00108 public:
00109 
00115     EGS_PhspSource(const string &phsp_file,
00116             const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00117 
00122     EGS_PhspSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00123     ~EGS_PhspSource() { };
00124 
00125     EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00126             int &q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00127             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u);
00128     void setSimulationChunk(EGS_I64 nstart, EGS_I64 nrun);
00129     EGS_Float getEmax() const { return Emax; };
00130     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00131         double aux = ((double) Nread)/((double) Nparticle);
00132         return Pinc*aux;
00133     };
00134     bool storeState(ostream &data) const {
00135         data << endl;
00136         bool res = egsStoreI64(data,Nread); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00137         res = egsStoreI64(data,Nfirst); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00138         res = egsStoreI64(data,Nlast); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00139         res = egsStoreI64(data,Npos); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00140         res = egsStoreI64(data,count); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00141         return res;
00142     };
00143     bool setState(istream &data) {
00144         first = false;
00145         bool res = egsGetI64(data,Nread); if( !res ) return res;
00146         res = egsGetI64(data,Nfirst); if( !res ) return res;
00147         res = egsGetI64(data,Nlast); if( !res ) return res;
00148         res = egsGetI64(data,Npos); if( !res ) return res;
00149         the_file.seekg((Npos+1)*recl,ios::beg);
00150         res = egsGetI64(data,count); return res;
00151     };
00152     bool addState(istream &data) {
00153         EGS_I64 tmp_Nread = Nread, tmp_count = count;
00154         bool res = setState(data);
00155         Nread += tmp_Nread; count += tmp_count;
00156         return res;
00157     };
00158     void resetCounter() { Nread = 0; count = 0; };
00159 
00160     bool isValid() const { return is_valid; };
00161 
00162     void setCutout(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax, EGS_Float ymin,
00163             EGS_Float ymax) {
00164         Xmin = xmin; Xmax = xmax; Ymin = ymin; Ymax = ymax;
00165     };
00166     void setFilter(int, int, int, const int *);
00167 
00168 protected:
00169
